distinct
from info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into info (id, infotype, infotitle, infocontent, infolinkman, infophone, infoemail, infodate, infocheck, infopayfor, infostatus) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{infotype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{infotitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infocontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infolinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infophone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infodate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{infocheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infopayfor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infostatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select:
select * from info
and infotitle LIKE CONCAT('%',#{infotitle},'%')
and infolinkman Like concat('%',#{infolinkman},'%')
and infophone Like concat('%',#{infophone},'%')
and infoemail like concat('%',#{infoemail},'%')
and infocontent like concat('%',#{infocontent},'%')
and id like concat('%',#{id},'%')
